textBeforeTable: 1-9 Z Y W V U T S R Q P O N M L K J I H G F E D C B A 1-9 ALL indicates that off-campus users will be prompted to log in. Use of electronic textbooks is restricted to users located in a Rutgers facility. If you are a qualified user, you may also access the full-text of these books from your home or office. To make this possible, you need a Rutgers NetID. For further information, visit remote access information section. The following is a title guide to the Health Sciences Libraries eBook library. Many of these titles are included in full-text collections such as AccessMedicine, Books@Ovid, ClinicalKey, NCBI Bookshelf, R2 Library and STAT!Ref. Others are available from individual publishers. Note: Some McGraw-Hill
